name: Spacecrafts (itch)
description:
Spacecrafts is an old game of mine from February 2017, it's one of the first games I ever made and the first game I ever finished/polished. Pretty much all other games I made before this are just me messing around and learning stuff. It was made in Game Maker 8.

I never published it anywhere, I didn't even know about itch.io back then. So I decided to just put it out now. Essentially just putting this here to document my game dev journey.

Description

Arcade mode: Fight off waves of enemy spaceships. Collect powerups to get temporary advantages.
Battle mode: Online (LAN, no guarantee that this works though) or Offline (Local). Fight another player, shoot them 10 times to win.
2 Player Mode: Like Arcade mode but with a co-op partner (Local)

Controls

Player 1
WASD - Move
Space - Shoot

Player 2
Arrow Keys - Move
Num0 - Shoot
